title: Friedrich Merz - Wikipedia
snippet: Exit polls released following the 2025 federal election showed CDU would win the most seats in the German parliament, albeit with its second worst result ever, thus ensuring Merz the role of Chancellor of Germany. In the aftermath of the election, the Christian Democratic Union (CDU) and the ...

title: Biography Federal Chancellor Merz
snippet: Friedrich Merz is Federal Chancellor of the Federal Republic of Germany.

title: Friedrich Merz | Politics, Germany, & Christian Democrats | Britannica
snippet: Friedrich Merz is a German lawyer, lobbyist, and politician who has served as leader of Germany’s Christian Democratic Union (CDU) party since 2022 and became the country’s chancellor in 2025.

title: Federal Chancellor
snippet: Friedrich Merz is Federal Chancellor of the Federal Republic of Germany.

title: Germany's new chancellor: Who is Friedrich Merz?
snippet: Now Merz's center-right Christian Democratic Union (CDU) the regional Bavarian Christian Social Union (CSU) and the center-left Social Democrats (SPD) will be working together as Germany's new government.
